Pre-Game Insights: The New York Yankees and Kansas City Royals are set to face off in Game 3 of their three-game series on September 11, 2024.
The Yankees have a 83-62 overall record and a 38-32 home record, while the Royals are 80-66 overall with a 35-36 road record.
Aaron Judge leads the Yankees with 51 home runs, while Bobby Witt Jr. tops the Royals with a.334 batting average.
The series is tied 1-1, with the Yankees leading the season series 4-2.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game can be watched live via Prime Video with a free trial, out of market on fuboTV, DirecTV Stream, and Sling.
Injuries for the Yankees include DJ LeMahieu, Cody Poteet, Jonathan Loaisiga, JT Brubaker, and Lou Trivino, while the Royals have several key players on the IL.
Others: The article provides information on how to watch the game and some pre-game statistics.
